comments.body: My, this file has a lot of very long lines ;)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +25,29 @@  sysflags="$($PYTHON -c "from distutils import sysconfig; print (sysconfig.get_config_var('CFLAGS'))")"
  # windows compilers have this requirement
  CFLAGS="$sysflags -Werror=declaration-after-statement -Werror=nonnull" $PYTHON setup.py build_ext --inplace
fi
}
